titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Mary E. Frye and George F. Newland marriage certificate 1977.479
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:10:30 +0000.

did.unittitle: Mary E. Frye and George F. Newland marriage certificate
did.abstract: Marriage certificate for Mary E. Frye of New York, N.Y. and George F. Newland of Detroit, MI, dated October 9, 1872. The service was performed by J.M. Buckley of the Summerfield Church in Brooklyn, N.Y.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Mary E. Frye and George F. Newland marriage certificate, 1977.479, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1977.
